item.description:
This event is free for all guests, reps of Youngevity please contact Bernadette Trafton at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com for more information.

As an outspoken advocate of Wholistic Health, Dr. Glidden has lectured to thousands of people over the last 2 decades. H...e delivers over 60 Free Lectures each year, and is a regular speaker at Health Freedom Expo & Youngevity Regional Meetings. He has appeared on TV, is a regular guest host of the “Dead Doctors Don’t Lie” Health Talk radio program, and gives free weekly seminars all over Chicagoland. His new book, The MD Emperor Has No Clothes, is an eye-opening, groundbreaking, jaw dropping exposition on the shortcomings of conventional MD directed medicine and the unrivaled excellence of Wholistic medical treatments. To listen to Dr. Glidden's "Being Healthy is easy" visit http://www.FDI4Life.com/ and listen for free.

The beginning portion of the day will be an overview of Youngevity and our phenomenal opportunity, followed by Dr. Glidden's Health lecture. To be invited to an exclusive dinner with Dr. Glidden, please contact Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com

 

The difference between healthy people vs. an Unhealthy people is education and information. Come to this meetup to learn how you can be a healthier and a stronger you by:

• Preventing Disease
• Managing and/or eradicating existing diseases
• Giving you more energy
• Just living a healthier and longer lifestyle

Come see what’s bad for and What Good for you. If you have or know anyone that suffers from:

Arthritis, Osteoporosis, Hypertension, Joint Injuries & Joint problems, Bone Spurs, Cancer's, Diabetes, Alzheimer’s, High Cholesterol, Asthma/Allergies, Fibromyalgia, ADD/ADHD…etc.

We will teach you how little changes in your eating habits can enhance your health and longevity as well as your families.

Just remember this phrase:
“It's Not What You Eat That Kills You; It's What You Don't Eat!”

We'll teach the importance of good solid nutrition.

See you all at this event.

RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Dr. Peter Glidden - Free Health Seminar
